Context: The George Brown College offers over 200 full-time programs across seven academic centers. Potential partners can collaborate with the college through work-integrated learning (WIL) opportunities and gain fresh perspectives from students to help solve business challenges and complete projects. Partners can contact the Work Integrated Learning Office at wil@georgebrown.ca or by phone at (416) 415-5000, ext. 3956. The college uses an online platform called Riipen to match students with employers across Canada and offers experiential and WIL opportunities through the Brookfield Sustainability Institute for students across the college. For more information or to stay updated on application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more, sign up on their website. The contact numbers for the general inquiries are 416-415-2000 with TTY: 1-877-515-5559 and ask.george@georgebrown.ca is the email address to contact.
